QuestData.Title: The Black Shield
QuestData.Description: Hmm... I don't see anything out of the ordinary with this shield. We should have Do'gol, the blacksmith, take a look at it, and see if he can tell us more about it, but I wouldn't hold out hope...
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Blackened Iron Shield to Do'gol in Brackenwall Village.
QuestData.RewardText: This is good shield. Very strong, heavy, good. But Do'gol don't need it. I make shields, not buy them, $n.$b$bYou should know that.
